problem_names:
lemma earlyLateOutput:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   b  :: name
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

lemma lateEarlyOutput:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   b  :: name
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

lemma outputEq:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   b  :: name
  and   P' :: pi

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P' = P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

lemma lateEarlyBoundOutput:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   x  :: name
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la<\<nu>x> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea<\<nu>x> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

lemma earlyLateBoundOutput:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   x  :: name
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea<\<nu>x> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la<\<nu>x> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

lemma BoundOutputEq:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   x  :: name
  and   P' :: pi

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea<\<nu>x> \<prec>\<^sub>e P' = P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la<\<nu>x> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

lemma lateEarlyInput:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   x  :: name
  and   P' :: pi
  and   u  :: name

  assumes PTrans: "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a<x> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea<u> \<prec>\<^sub>e (P'[x::=u])"

lemma earlyLateInput:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   x  :: name
  and   P' :: pi
  and   u  :: name
  and   C  :: "'a::fs_name"

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea<u> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"
  and     "x \<sharp> P"

  shows "\<exists>P''. P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la<x> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'' \<and> P' = P''[x::=u]"

lemma lateEarlyTau:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l\<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e\<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

lemma earlyLateTau:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e\<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l\<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

lemma tauEq:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   P' :: pi

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e(Early_Semantics.FreeR Early_Semantics.TauR P') = P \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

lemma lateEarlySim:
  fixes P   :: pi
  and   Q   :: pi
  and   Rel :: "(pi \<times> pi) set"

  assumes PSimQ: "P \<leadsto>\<^sub>l[Rel] Q"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sub>e[Rel] Q"

lemma lateEarlyBisim:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sub>l Q"

  shows "P \<sim>\<^sub>e Q"

lemma lateEarlyCong:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s\<^sub>l Q"

  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s\<^sub>e Q"

lemma earlyCongStructCong:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q"

  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s\<^sub>e Q"

lemma earlyBisimStructCong:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q"

  shows "P \<sim>\<^sub>e Q"
translations:
lemma earlyLateOutput:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   a  :: name
  and   b  :: name
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>ea[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>la[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'
proof(nominal_induct rule: Early_Semantics.outputInduct)

proof (state)
goal (9 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b P. a{b}.P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P
 2. \<And>P a b P' c.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [c\<frown>c]P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'
 3. \<And>P a b P' c d.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P';
        c \<noteq> d\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [c\<noteq>d]P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'
 4. \<And>P a b P' Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<oplus>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'
 5. \<And>Q a b Q' P.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e Q';
        Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<oplus>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l Q'
 6. \<And>P a b P' Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P' \<parallel>
                                Q
 7. \<And>Q a b Q' P.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e Q';
        Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P \<parallel>
                                Q'
 8. \<And>P a b P' x.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P';
        x \<noteq> a; x \<noteq> b;
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>x>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l <\<nu>x>P'
 9. \<And>P a b P'.
       \<lbrakk>P \<parallel>
                !P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>e P';
        P \<parallel>
        !P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P'
case(Output a b P)

    next

lemma lateEarlyTau:
  fixes P  :: pi
  and   P' :: pi

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l\<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'"

  shows "P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e\<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'
proof(nominal_induct rule: Late_Semantics.tauInduct)

proof (state)
goal (13 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P. \<tau>.P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P
 2. \<And>P P' c.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [c\<frown>c]P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'
 3. \<And>P P' c d.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P';
        c \<noteq> d\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [c\<noteq>d]P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'
 4. \<And>P P' Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<oplus>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'
 5. \<And>Q Q' P.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l Q';
        Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<oplus>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e Q'
 6. \<And>P P' Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l P';
        P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P' \<parallel>
                                  Q
 7. \<And>Q Q' P.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>l Q';
        Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P \<parallel>
                                  Q'
 8. \<And>P a x P' Q b Q'.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a<x> \<prec>\<^sub>l P';
        Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l Q'; x \<sharp> P;
        x \<sharp> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>e \<tau> \<prec>\<^sub>e P'[x::=b] \<parallel>
                                  Q'
 9. \<And>P a b P' Q x Q'.
       \<lbrakk>P \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a[b] \<prec>\<^sub>l P';
        Q \<longmapsto>\<^sub>l a<x> \<prec>\<^sub>l Q'; x \<sharp> P;
        x \<sharp> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>

  ?P \<sim>\<^sup>s\<^sub>l ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<sim>\<^sup>s\<^sub>e ?Q
  ?P \<equiv>\<^sub>s ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<sim>\<^sup>s\<^sub>l ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<sim>\<^sup>s\<^sub>e Q
by blast

lemma earlyBisimStructCong:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q"

  shows "P \<sim>\<^sub>e Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<sim>\<^sub>e Q
using assms lateEarlyBisim structCongBisim

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q
  ?P \<sim>\<^sub>l ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<sim>\<^sub>e ?Q
  ?P \<equiv>\<^sub>s ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<sim>\<^sub>l ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<sim>\<^sub>e Q
by blast
end
